title: Lore Explainer: Ciaphas Cain
description: In this week's Lore Explainer, we dive into Ciphas Cain, one of the best characters in 40k fiction and a great jumping off point for new Black Library readers.

title: The March UK Goonhammer Open grows stronger
description: The UK Goonhammer Open grows stronger, with Warhammer Championship qualifier status for 40K and Age of Sigmar, alongside a newly added Horus Heresy event!

title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Rearguard Action pt.2
description: We’re back for part 2, watching the final death throes (?) of some of the builds that have dominated the last few months. If you want to know what’s coming next for the metagame, make sure to check out of our review of the Dataslate, and if you want to salute some of the greats […]

title: 10th Edition Competitive Faction Focus: Adeptus Custodes (Updated February 2, 2024)
description: We take a deep dive into the Adeptus Custodes, and look at their key units and strategies.

title: SRM’s Ongoing Stormbringer Review: Week 11
description: Stormbringer is a weekly hobby magazine from Hachette Partworks introducing players to Warhammer: Age of Sigmar. In this 80-week series, our intrepid magazine-receiver will be reviewing each individual issue, its included models, and gaming materials. A Premium US subscription was provided to Goonhammer for review purposes. If you want to follow along at home, US […]
